copyright.title: Copyright Notice
copyright.content: Â© 2025 Cyna. All rights reserved. All content, design, graphics, and other intellectual materials on this website are owned by Cyna and protected by applicable copyright laws.

trademark.content: All Cyna trademarks, service marks, trade names, and logos displayed on this website are the property of Cyna or their respective owners. Nothing contained on this website should be construed as granting any license or right to use any trademark without the prior written permission of Cyna.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer of Warranties
disclaimer.content: This website and all information, content, materials, and services included on or otherwise made available to you through this website are provided on an "as is" and "as available" basis.
disclaimer.additional: CYNA MAKES NO REPRESENTATIONS OR WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, AS TO THE OPERATION OF THIS WEBSITE OR THE INFORMATION, CONTENT, MATERIALS, OR SERVICES INCLUDED ON OR OTHERWISE MADE AVAILABLE TO YOU THROUGH THIS WEBSITE.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: TO THE FULL EXTENT PERMISSIBLE BY APPLICABLE LAW, CYNA DISCLAIMS ALL WARRANTIES, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.
liability.additional: CYNA DOES NOT WARRANT THAT THIS WEBSITE, ITS SERVERS, OR E-MAIL SENT FROM CYNA ARE FREE OF VIRUSES OR OTHER HARMFUL COMPONENTS.

export.title: Export Control
export.content: The software and technology provided through our services may be subject to U.S. export controls administered by the U.S. Department of Commerce, U.S. Department of Treasury Office of Foreign Assets Control, and other U.S. agencies.
export.additional: You acknowledge and agree that the service shall not be used, and none of the underlying information, software, or technology may be transferred or otherwise exported or re-exported to countries as to which the United States maintains an embargo.

governing.title: Governing Law
governing.content: These legal notices and your use of this website shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the United States and the State of Delaware, without giving effect to any principles of conflicts of law.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: If you have any questions about these legal notices, please contact us:

changes.title: Changes to Legal Notices
changes.content: Cyna reserves the right to modify these legal notices at any time. We will post any changes to these legal notices on this page and, if the changes are significant, we will provide a more prominent notice.
changes.additional: Your continued use of our website following the posting of changes to these legal notices will mean you accept those changes.

lastUpdated.title: Last Updated
lastUpdated.content: These legal notices were last updated on March 14, 2025.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Welcome to Cyna ("Company", "we", "our", "us"). This Privacy Policy ("Policy") describes how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you visit our website and use our services (collectively, the "Service").

data.title: Data Collection
data.content: We may collect personal information from you when you visit our website or use our services. This information may include your name, email address, phone number, and other contact information.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: We use cookies to improve your experience on our website. By using our website, you consent to the use of cookies.

third-party.title: Third-Party Services
third-party.content: We may use third-party services to improve our website and services. These services may collect information about your use of our website and services.

security.title: Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.

changes.title: Changes to Privacy Policy
changes.content: We reserve the right to update this Privacy Policy at any time. We will post any changes to this Privacy Policy on this page and, if the changes are significant, we will provide a more prominent notice.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us.

consent.title: Consent
consent.content: By using our website and services, you consent to the terms of this Privacy Policy.

lastUpdated.title: Last Updated
lastUpdated.content: This Privacy Policy was last updated on March 14, 2025.

definitions.title: Definitions
definitions.client: Client: any professional or capable natural person within the meaning of articles 1123 et seq. of the Civil Code, or legal entity, who visits the site subject to these general conditions.
definitions.content: Content: all elements constituting the information present on the site, notably texts, images, videos.
definitions.clientInfo: Client information: hereinafter referred to as "information(s)" which correspond to all personal data that may be held by https://www.cyna-it.fr for account management, customer relationship management, and for analysis and statistical purposes.
definitions.user: User: internet user connecting to and using the aforementioned site.
definitions.personalInfo: Personal information: "information that allows, in any form whatsoever, directly or indirectly, the identification of the natural persons to whom it applies" (article 4 of law nÂ° 78-17 of January 6, 1978).
definitions.gdpr: The terms "personal data", "data subject", "processor" and "sensitive data" have the meaning defined by the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR: nÂ° 2016-679)

presentation.title: 1. Website Presentation
presentation.content: Pursuant to article 6 of law nÂ° 2004-575 of June 21, 2004 on confidence in the digital economy, users of the website https://www.cyna-it.fr are informed of the identity of the various parties involved in its creation and monitoring:
presentation.owner: Owner: SAS Cyna-IT with share capital of 1000 eurosâ VAT number: FR20913711032 - 10 rue de PenthiÃ¨vre 75008 Paris
presentation.publicationNote: The publication manager is a natural person or a legal entity.
presentation.dpo: Data Protection Officer: Nathan Bramli - nathan.bramli@cyna-it.fr

conditions.title: 2. General Terms of Use for the Site and Services Offered
conditions.content: The site constitutes an intellectual work protected by the provisions of the Intellectual Property Code and applicable international regulations. The client may not in any way reuse, transfer, or exploit for their own account all or part of the elements or works of the site.
conditions.acceptance: The use of the website https://www.cyna-it.fr implies full and complete acceptance of the general terms of use described herein. These terms of use may be modified or supplemented at any time, so users of the https://www.cyna-it.fr website are invited to consult them regularly.
conditions.availability: This website is normally accessible to users at all times. However, https://www.cyna-it.fr may decide to interrupt the site for technical maintenance, and will endeavor to communicate the dates and times of the intervention to users in advance. The website https://www.cyna-it.fr is regularly updated by the https://www.cyna-it.fr manager. Similarly, the legal notices may be modified at any time: they nevertheless apply to the user, who is invited to refer to them as often as possible in order to be aware of them.

services.title: 3. Description of Services Provided
services.content: The website https://www.cyna-it.fr aims to provide information concerning all of the company's activities. https://www.cyna-it.fr strives to provide information that is as accurate as possible on the https://www.cyna-it.fr website. However, it cannot be held responsible for omissions, inaccuracies, and deficiencies in updates, whether they are its own doing or that of third-party partners who provide this information.
services.information: All information indicated on the https://www.cyna-it.fr website is given as an indication, and is subject to change. Furthermore, the information on the https://www.cyna-it.fr website is not exhaustive. It is provided subject to modifications having been made since it was put online.

technical.title: 4. Contractual Limitations on Technical Data
technical.content: The site uses JavaScript technology. The website cannot be held responsible for material damage related to the use of the site. In addition, the site user agrees to access the site using recent equipment that does not contain viruses and with an up-to-date latest-generation browser. The https://www.cyna-it.fr website is hosted by a provider in the European Union in accordance with the provisions of the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR: nÂ° 2016-679)
technical.hosting: The objective is to provide a service that ensures the best accessibility rate. The host ensures the continuity of its service 24 hours a day, every day of the year. However, it reserves the right to interrupt the hosting service for the shortest possible periods, particularly for maintenance purposes, to improve its infrastructure, in the event of infrastructure failure, or if the services and benefits generate traffic deemed abnormal. https://www.cyna-it.fr and the host cannot be held responsible in the event of malfunction of the internet network, telephone lines, or computer and telephone equipment related in particular to network congestion preventing access to the server.

ip.title: 5. Intellectual Property and Counterfeiting
ip.content: https://www.cyna-it.fr owns the intellectual property rights and holds the usage rights to all elements accessible on the website, including texts, images, graphics, logos, videos, icons, and sounds. Any reproduction, representation, modification, publication, adaptation of all or part of the elements of the site, regardless of the means or process used, is prohibited without prior written permission from https://www.cyna-it.fr.
ip.infringement: Any unauthorized exploitation of the site or any of the elements it contains will be considered as constituting an infringement and prosecuted in accordance with the provisions of articles L.335-2 and following of the Intellectual Property Code.

liability.title: 6. Limitations of Liability
liability.content: https://www.cyna-it.fr acts as the publisher of the site. https://www.cyna-it.fr is responsible for the quality and truthfulness of the content it publishes.
liability.damages: https://www.cyna-it.fr cannot be held responsible for direct and indirect damage caused to the user's equipment when accessing the https://www.cyna-it.fr website, resulting either from the use of equipment that does not meet the specifications indicated in point 4, or from the appearance of a bug or incompatibility.
liability.indirect: https://www.cyna-it.fr cannot also be held responsible for indirect damages (such as loss of market or loss of opportunity) resulting from the use of the https://www.cyna-it.fr website. Interactive spaces (possibility to ask questions in the contact area) are available to users. https://www.cyna-it.fr reserves the right to remove, without prior notice, any content posted in this space that would contravene the legislation applicable in France, in particular the provisions relating to data protection. If necessary, https://www.cyna-it.fr also reserves the possibility of questioning the civil and/or criminal liability of the user, especially in the event of a message that is racist, insulting, defamatory, or pornographic, regardless of the medium used (text, photograph...).

data.title: 7. Personal Data Management
data.content: The client is informed of the regulations concerning marketing communication, the law of June 21, 2014 for confidence in the digital economy, the data protection act of August 06, 2004, as well as the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR: nÂ° 2016-679).

responsible.title: 7.1 Personal Data Collection Managers
responsible.content: For personal data collected as part of the creation of the user's personal account and their navigation on the site, the controller of personal data is: Cyna-IT. https://www.cyna-it.fr is represented by Bramli Nathan, its legal representative.
responsible.commitment: As the controller of the data it collects, https://www.cyna-it.fr undertakes to comply with the framework of the legal provisions in force. It is notably the client's responsibility to establish the purposes of its data processing, to provide its prospects and clients, from the collection of their consent, with complete information on the processing of their personal data, and to maintain a register of processing in accordance with reality. Whenever https://www.cyna-it.fr processes personal data, https://www.cyna-it.fr takes all reasonable measures to ensure the accuracy and relevance of the personal data with regard to the purposes for which https://www.cyna-it.fr processes it.

purpose.title: 7.2 Purpose of Collected Data
purpose.content: https://www.cyna-it.fr is likely to process all or part of the data:
purpose.navigation: - To enable navigation on the site and the management and traceability of services ordered by the user: connection and site usage data, billing, order history, etc.
purpose.fraud: - To prevent and combat computer fraud (spamming, hacking...): computer hardware used for browsing, IP address, password
purpose.improvement: - To improve navigation on the site: connection and usage data to conduct optional satisfaction surveys on https://www.cyna-it.fr: email address
purpose.communication: - To conduct communication campaigns (SMS, email): phone number, email address
purpose.usage: https://www.cyna-it.fr does not market your personal data, which is therefore only used out of necessity or for statistical and analytical purposes.

rights.title: 7.3 Right of Access, Rectification, and Opposition
rights.content: In accordance with current European regulations, users of https://www.cyna-it.fr have the following rights:
rights.access: Right of access (article 15 GDPR) and rectification (article 16 GDPR), updating, completeness of user data
rights.lock: Right to lock or erase users' personal data (article 17 GDPR), when it is inaccurate, incomplete, equivocal, outdated, or whose collection, use, communication, or storage is prohibited
rights.consent: Right to withdraw consent at any time (article 13-2c GDPR)
rights.limit: Right to limit the processing of user data (article 18 GDPR)
rights.objection: Right to object to the processing of user data (article 21 GDPR)
rights.portability: Right to data portability that users have provided, when such data is subject to automated processing based on their consent or on a contract (article 20 GDPR)
rights.death: Right to define the fate of users' data after their death and to choose to whom https://www.cyna-it.fr should (or should not) communicate their data to a third party they have previously designated
rights.posthumous: As soon as https://www.cyna-it.fr becomes aware of the death of a user and in the absence of instructions from them, https://www.cyna-it.fr undertakes to destroy their data, unless its retention proves necessary for evidentiary purposes or to meet a legal obligation.
rights.exercise: If the user wishes to know how https://www.cyna-it.fr uses their personal data, asks to rectify it, or opposes its processing, the user can contact https://www.cyna-it.fr in writing at the following address:
rights.contact:
Cyna-IT - DPO, Nathan Bramli
10 rue de PenthiÃ¨vre 75008 Paris.
rights.identification: In this case, the user must indicate the personal data they would like https://www.cyna-it.fr to correct, update, or delete, by identifying themselves precisely with a copy of an identity document (ID card or passport).
rights.deletion: Requests to delete personal data will be subject to the obligations imposed on https://www.cyna-it.fr by law, particularly regarding the retention or archiving of documents. Finally, users of https://www.cyna-it.fr can file a complaint with the supervisory authorities, particularly the CNIL (https://www.cnil.fr/fr/plaintes).

noncommunication.title: 7.4 Non-communication of Personal Data
noncommunication.content: https://www.cyna-it.fr refrains from processing, hosting, or transferring the information collected on its clients to a country located outside the European Union or recognized as "inadequate" by the European Commission without informing the client beforehand. However, https://www.cyna-it.fr remains free to choose its technical and commercial subcontractors on the condition that they provide sufficient guarantees with regard to the requirements of the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR: nÂ° 2016-679).
noncommunication.security: https://www.cyna-it.fr undertakes to take all necessary precautions to preserve the security of information and in particular that it is not communicated to unauthorized persons. However, if an incident affecting the integrity or confidentiality of the client's information is brought to the attention of https://www.cyna-it.fr, it must inform the client as soon as possible and communicate the corrective measures taken. Furthermore, https://www.cyna-it.fr does not collect any "sensitive data".
noncommunication.processing: The user's personal data may be processed by subsidiaries of https://www.cyna-it.fr and subcontractors (service providers), exclusively for the purposes of this policy.
noncommunication.access: Within the limits of their respective attributions and for the purposes mentioned above, the main people likely to have access to the data of https://www.cyna-it.fr users are primarily the agents of our customer service.

incident.title: 8. Incident Notification
incident.content: Regardless of the efforts made, no method of transmission over the Internet and no method of electronic storage is completely secure. Consequently, we cannot guarantee absolute security. If we become aware of a security breach, we will notify the affected users so they can take appropriate measures. Our incident notification procedures take into account our legal obligations, whether at the national or European level. We are committed to fully informing our customers of all matters concerning the security of their account and to providing them with all necessary information to help them meet their own regulatory reporting obligations.
incident.privacy: No personal information of the user of the https://www.cyna-it.fr site is published without the user's knowledge, exchanged, transferred, assigned, or sold on any medium to third parties. Only the hypothesis of the purchase of https://www.cyna-it.fr and its rights would allow the transmission of said information to the potential buyer who would in turn be bound by the same obligation to preserve and modify the data with respect to the user of the https://www.cyna-it.fr site.
incident.security: To ensure the security and confidentiality of personal data and health personal data, https://www.cyna-it.fr uses networks protected by standard devices such as firewalls, pseudonymization, encryption, and passwords.
incident.measures: When processing personal data, https://www.cyna-it.fr takes all reasonable measures to protect it against any loss, misuse, unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction.

cookies.title: 9. Hypertext Links, Cookies and Internet Beacons
cookies.content: The https://www.cyna-it.fr site contains a number of hypertext links to other sites, established with the authorization of https://www.cyna-it.fr. However, https://www.cyna-it.fr does not have the ability to verify the content of the sites visited, and therefore will assume no responsibility for this fact.
cookies.usage: Unless you decide to disable cookies, you agree that the site may use them. You can disable these cookies at any time, free of charge, using the deactivation options offered to you and recalled below, knowing that this may reduce or prevent accessibility to all or part of the services offered by the site.

definition.title: 9.1. Cookies
definition.content: A "cookie" is a small information file sent to the user's browser and stored on the user's terminal (e.g., computer, smartphone), (hereinafter "cookies"). This file includes information such as the user's domain name, the user's Internet service provider, the user's operating system, and the date and time of access. Cookies in no way risk damaging the user's terminal.
definition.processing: https://www.cyna-it.fr may process information about the user concerning their visit to the site, such as the pages viewed, the searches carried out. This information allows https://www.cyna-it.fr to improve the content of the site and the user's navigation.
definition.configuration: Cookies facilitating navigation and/or the provision of services offered by the site, the user can configure their browser to allow them to decide whether they want to accept them so that cookies are stored in the terminal or, on the contrary, that they are rejected, either systematically or according to their issuer. The user can also configure their browser software so that the acceptance or rejection of cookies is offered to them occasionally, before a cookie is likely to be stored in their terminal. https://www.cyna-it.fr informs the user that, in this case, it may be that not all the functionalities of their browser software are available.
definition.rejection: If the user refuses the registration of cookies in their terminal or browser, the user is informed that their navigation and experience on the site may be limited. This could also be the case when https://www.cyna-it.fr or one of its providers cannot recognize, for technical compatibility purposes, the type of browser used by the terminal, the language and display settings, or the country from which the terminal appears to be connected to the internet.
definition.responsibility: If applicable, https://www.cyna-it.fr disclaims any responsibility for the consequences related to the degraded functioning of the site and any services offered by https://www.cyna-it.fr, resulting from (i) the refusal of cookies by the user (ii) the impossibility for https://www.cyna-it.fr to record or consult the cookies necessary for their operation due to the user's choice. For the management of cookies and user choices, the configuration of each browser is different. It is described in the browser's help menu, which will let you know how the user can modify their wishes regarding cookies.
definition.choices: At any time, the user can choose to express and modify their wishes regarding cookies. https://www.cyna-it.fr may also use the services of external providers to help collect and process the information described in this section.
definition.socialMedia: Finally, by clicking on the icons dedicated to the social networks Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn, and Google Plus appearing on the https://www.cyna-it.fr website or in its mobile application and if the user has accepted the deposit of cookies by continuing their navigation on the https://www.cyna-it.fr website or mobile application, Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn, and Google Plus can also deposit cookies on your terminals (computer, tablet, mobile phone).
definition.consent: These types of cookies are only deposited on your terminals if you consent to it, by continuing your navigation on the https://www.cyna-it.fr website or mobile application. At any time, the user can nevertheless revoke their consent to https://www.cyna-it.fr depositing this type of cookies.

beacons.title: 9.2. Internet Beacons
beacons.content: https://www.cyna-it.fr may occasionally employ internet beacons (also called "tags", or action tags, one-pixel GIFs, transparent GIFs, invisible GIFs, and one-to-one GIFs) and deploy them through a web analytics partner who may be located (and therefore store the corresponding information, including the user's IP address) in a foreign country.
beacons.usage: These beacons are placed both in online advertisements enabling internet users to access the site, and on the various pages of the site.
beacons.purpose: This technology allows https://www.cyna-it.fr to evaluate visitors' responses to the site and the effectiveness of its actions (for example, the number of times a page is opened and the information viewed), as well as the user's use of this site.
beacons.thirdParty: The external provider may possibly collect information about visitors to the site and other websites through these beacons, compile reports on the site's activity for https://www.cyna-it.fr, and provide other services relating to the use of the site and the internet.

jurisdiction.title: 10. Applicable Law and Jurisdiction
jurisdiction.content: Any dispute relating to the use of the https://www.cyna-it.fr site is subject to French law. Except in cases where the law does not allow it, exclusive jurisdiction is attributed to the competent courts of Paris.

about.title: About Cyna
about.introduction: Cyna is a leading provider of enterprise-grade cybersecurity solutions. Our mission is to protect businesses from evolving cyber threats through innovative technology and expert services.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We believe that every organization deserves access to enterprise-grade security. Our solutions combine cutting-edge technology with expert human intelligence to provide comprehensive protection against modern cyber threats.

expertTeam.title: Expert Team
expertTeam.description: Our security experts have decades of combined experience in cybersecurity, threat intelligence, and incident response.

advancedTechnology.title: Advanced Technology
advancedTechnology.description: We leverage the latest AI and machine learning technologies to provide real-time threat detection and response.

support.title: 24/7 Support
support.description: Our security operations center provides round-the-clock monitoring and support to protect your business.

globalCoverage.title: Global Coverage
globalCoverage.description: With a global network of security operations centers, we provide protection for businesses worldwide.
